name: Starship
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: starship
des:
This is a demo of a larger RPG Sci-Fi game, that is under construction. In this demo you will be able to fight an enemy starship in a turn-based battle. Alexa will be your on-board computer. 
Your ship and the enemy ship will be randomly equipped with 2 weapons and 1 shield. 
You can choose to fire lasers, missiles, or rail guns. Or you can choose to scan and analyze the enemy ship to get a better idea of how to destroy it, but be careful because scanning the enemy ship takes up your turn.
The weapons work in a rock-paper-scissors fashion. Lasers beat missiles, missiles beat rail guns, and rail guns beat lasers.
Good luck.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
